traceability.evidence:
The implementation of config file support is in src/config-loader.js and integrated in src/cli-options.js. The test suite includes test/cli.config-file.test.js which references prompts/010.0-DEV-CONFIG-FILE-SUPPORT.md and covers: - Reading .dry-aged-deps.json by default - Merging config values (minAge, severity, prod/dev thresholds, format) - CLI flags overriding config values - Error handling for invalid JSON, unknown keys, out-of-range values - Support for custom config file name via --config-file - Exiting with code 2 and clear error messages on missing/invalid config
Documentation in README.md includes --config-file option, example config file, and example usage showing config values applied when running without flags.
All relevant tests pass (186 tests, >98% coverage) and there are no errors or warnings in lint, typecheck, or CI pipeline.
traceability.notes: All acceptance criteria for story 010.0-DEV-CONFIG-FILE-SUPPORT are satisfied: config file location, schema support for CLI options, flag precedence, validation, error handling, optional presence, defaults, and documentation. The behavior is fully tested and documented.
